name: Ellison Bay Black TV Stand for TVs up to 50"
categoryPath: Home/Furniture/Living Room Furniture/TV Stands & Entertainment Centers/TV Stands

reviews.name: Ellison Bay Black TV Stand for TVs up to 50"
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this stand was very easy to assemble. I had no problem putting it together, all by myself. The frame is very strong and of good quality. Once it was assembled, it looks goooood. We have a 50" flat screen and it looks like it was made for this stand. Fits perfectly. I'm very happy with it. Could not be more pleased.
reviews.title: I am so pleased with this TV Stand.

reviews.name: Ellison Bay Black TV Stand for TVs up to 50"
reviews.reviewText: This TV stand looks like you spent a fortune on it. It is 100x nicer than the picture. The glass shelves are solid black. The weight limit for the top shelf is 150 lbs, middle and bottom shelves is 65 lbs each. Spacing between the shelves is approx 7 inches. The edge of the top shelf sits back approx 6 inches from the edge of the middle shelf so you can put taller items (vase or something maybe) on the middle shelf.
reviews.title: High Quality TV Stand - Excellent Value

reviews.name: Ellison Bay Black TV Stand for TVs up to 50"
reviews.reviewText: I lost my 1st one in a house fire and really wished to replace it. The store I originally purchased it from doesn't carry them anymore. Walmart.com had it for me at nearly half the $ of other online retailers and even with their outrageous Hawai`i surcharge it was still cheaper.
reviews.title: My second time with this one
